title: In-game client is causing 6000 ping lag spikes for you and teammates?
body:
Seems like league's client is literally causing 6000 ping spikes to any person, I've played about 2 games to this point and I've been affected once, the next game it seemed like my teammates were affected. This ping spike would go on for as long as you were in the game until you restarted your client? I lost both games cause of this issue, why is this even happening and why am I losing LP in ranked because of the fact that riot is causing people to have 6000 ping spikes and AFKing?

Does anyone have any idea as to why this is happening... I am 100% sure this is not luck based as it happened 2 times in a row. My friend is also constantly getting it in her games aswell. 

Friend in ARAM Lagging: https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/329978324715831298/374184945335271424/unknown.png

replies.body:
Is this happening 100% of the time for every single player in the match or only partially? A lot of this depends on how well your own network is configured as well, so it's always good to start with the basics. 

Adjust your Port Forwarding and DNS connections really quickly for me using those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and also make sure you have the option "Close Client during Game" checked in the client settings. Test those in a custom or practice game and let me know how it helps.
